publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5038 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No. 3) Order 2006—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No. 3) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*

S2M-5038 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No. 3) Order 2006—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Scotland Act 1998 (Transfer of Functions to the Scottish Ministers etc.) (No. 3) Order 2006 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson
